Text: You need to google ghost trick patched - this version has no text in it and so it is unplayable.
You need to google 'ghost trick patched' - this version has no text and so is unplayable (thanks to the uploader - not)
Playing through the first mission, dialogue is there.  Using R4DS w/ Wood r4 1.26
my emulator only says 'Require BIOS-ROM image to execute undef opcode exeptions.' Help?
If you have an R4, you should be able to get the alternative firmware, "WoodR4", and that bypasses the anti-piracy of this game.
